title: PEACE BE ON THIS HOUSE BESTOWED

author.name: Charles Wesley
author.bio: Charles Wesley was an English leader of the Methodist movement, most widely known for writing about 6,500 hymns.

lyrics:
Peace be on this house bestowed
Peace on all that here reside
Let the unknown peace of God
With the manner of peace abide.

Let Thy Spirit now come down
Let Thy blessing now take place
Son of peace receive Thy crown
Fullness of Thy gospel grace.

Christ my master and my God
Let me die for honour be
Oh be mindful of these words
Visit them and visit me.
